events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection, requesting claim initiation immediately.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial details provided by the customer describing the car collision.
An agent was assigned to handle the investigation and communication regarding the reported vehicle collision claim.
Acknowledgement sent to customer confirming receipt of the vehicle collision claim and informing the next steps in the process.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance documents from the customer to proceed with the auto accident claim.
Customer uploaded the police report, car photos, and insurance documents to support the investigation of the vehicle collision claim.
Investigation commenced by examining all submitted documents and verifying the details of the car accident with involved parties.
Investigation concluded confirming vehicle collision circumstances aligning with the claim details and establishing liability.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and damages resulting from the car accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and thanked the agent for timely processing of the accident claim.
The claim was formally approved after customer accepted the settlement terms relating to the vehicle collision.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover damages incurred in the auto accident.
The vehicle collision claim was officially closed following payment confirmation and final documentation submission.
All documentation and correspondence related to the completed auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
